posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I hate to be a pest but I was looking at this subrace and wondering what build would be perfect for it.  I am assuming Weapon Master and Shadow Dancer
but what would be good for the first class.  Since you get Expertise and whirlwind attack free it does not have to be fighter.

race: half-elf
subarace: ninja
Str +4, Dex +4, Wis -4, Cha -4
benefits: intimidate 4, move silenty 8, hide 10, Expertise, whirlwind attack

thoughts?

David

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Rogue might be a good one - particularly if you fancy Epic Dodge. It might still be a bit feat-starved if you still need all the other WM pre-requirements - but at least Dodge and Mobility count for SD as well. But you'd get lots of skills, which the other two classes don't really bring, so you can tailor what your pc will specialize in.

Just a thought
